description:
There is more to this waffle-knit crew style than meets the eye. A great layering piece, this men's long sleeve features a high-performance wool blend fabric, that is odor-reducing, helps regulate temperature, and offers classic style.

And don't worry about it being itchy, because we put a recycled polyester yarn on the inside, which is moisture-wicking and cozy on the skin. It's stretchy too, which makes it the perfect layer for those active days where you need your gear to move with you.
name: Prana Wensley Crew - Slim - Mens
